features: This conditioner for curly hair and coily hair strengthens and moisturizes, when paired with the Curl Define shampoo it restores strength from within. For defined, moisturized curls in one use
This curl enhancing conditioner is a deep conditioner for curly hair and coily hair that provides intensive moisture and easy detangling
This protein conditioner is made with our exclusive ProteinFusion blend with Marula Oil and Silk protein
Our hair conditioner will preserve and protect curly and coily hair's natural protein to deliver salon quality results
For best results, use this curl enhancing conditioner for curly hair and coily hair after using our Curl Define sulfate-free shampoo
body.description: Nexxus Curl Define Moisturizing Conditioner for curly hair and coily hair has been specially formulated to help strengthen and moisturize curly hair. This deep conditioner for curly hair when paired with the Curl Define collection restores strength from within. For defined, moisturized curls in one use. Created with our exclusive PROTEINFUSION blend with silk protein and marula oil, this hair conditioner helps preserve and protect the essential proteins curly and coily hair needs. For best results, use with the Nexxus Curl Define Sulfate-free Shampoo. First, apply shampoo to wet hair, working it into a lather before rinsing thoroughly. Then, apply the Curl Define Conditioner, let rest for 3 minutes, and rinse thoroughly. This conditioner for curly hair and coily hair provides intensive moisture and easy detangling. Nexxus scientists use the science of Proteomics to examine hair damage at the molecular level and discovered the protein makeup of curly and coily hair is different from other hair types. After identifying the proteins curly and coily hair needs, they developed a unique PROTEINFUSION blend with Silk Protein and Marula oil, along with other ingredients, to create Curl Define formulas that result in stronger, more defined curly and coily hair. Our Curl Define range includes new formats of hair products for curly hair and coily hair that create an optimal regimen for both curly and coily hair types. The range includes products like a pre-wash treatment, sulfate free shampoo, and leave-in conditioner

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nexxus Curl Define Conditioner, custom crafted with marula oil, provides intense moisture and easy detangling for stronger defined curly and coily hair.

The Full Range Our Curl Define range features a shampoo, conditioner, pre-wash treatment and leave in conditioner and has been specially crafted to work for type 3A-4C curls. The Science Through using advanced science, Nexxus scientists discovered the proteins and ingredients curly and coily hair needs to stay healthy-looking and strong. From there, they created a custom formula to help restore curly and coily hair. The Ingredients Features our exclusive ProteinFusion blend of silk protein + marula oil. Silk is known for its strength and marula oil is known for nourishment. When using the NCD range, you will have less breakage of your delicate curls. Proven Results Our Nexxus Curl Define system restores strength from within. For defined, moisturized curls in 1 use.

NEXXUS CURL DEFINE SHAMPOO NEXXUS CURL DEFINE ULTRA-8 PRE-WASH TREATMENT NEXXUS CURL DEFINE LEAVE-IN CONDITIONER Nexxus Curl Define Shampoo cleanses curly and coily hair with a nourishing lather. Nexxus Curl Define Pre-wash treatment detangles, nourishes hair & scalp, reduces breakage, moisturizes, defines, hydrates, softens, elongates coils and curls. Nexxus Curl Define Leave-in Conditioner replenishes and locks in moisture, helps control frizz, and leaves curls soft and defined.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shampoo and conditioner for curly hair
reviews.reviewText: Love this shampoo and conditioner!!! It makes my hair smell and look amazing. I have curly red hair its hard to find good products for. Will highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps the frizz controlled
reviews.reviewText: I love that my natural curly hair frizz is under control.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keeps the knots away
reviews.reviewText: I like this and use it daily only like a shampo for my natural curly 3c hair. I've been happy using this brand for decades and will keep using it, Leaves a nice healthy shine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wave enhancer!
reviews.reviewText: Got a textured bob and wanted to engage my natural waves without using styling products or heated tools. Can wash and wear; hair feels soft and bouncy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this product, leaves my curly hair smooth and frizz free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiiful Curls but Greasy Film
reviews.reviewText: Really makes my natural curls beautiful but leaves a nasty, greasy film on my roots. It's impossible to rinse this shampoo and conditioner out of my hair.. The bottles are really small so I wouldn't recommend if you have long full hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I didn't realize it was scented
reviews.reviewText: I guess I didn't fully read that this was scented. I saw there was an unscented one, so I'll get that one next time. Still love this Conditioner though, just not the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I like to receive the items that I buy …I never receive it !
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this products and I love them …This time although ,I bought a shampoo and conditioner ,they send it in different packages ,even if I bought them at the same time !And guess what ,they said they left the package and producto on my door ,they included or say they did include it in the package with my dogs bed ,and surprise , the conditioner is not there !!! They did not sent it !
